cost_objection.objection: Temp workers cost more per hour than permanent employees
cost_objection.real_concern: Sticker shock at hourly rate without seeing total picture
cost_objection.authentic_response: You're right - the hourly rate is higher. But you're comparing apples to oranges. With temps, you pay zero for: recruitment ads, interview time, benefits, payroll taxes, workers comp premiums, unemployment insurance, or hours when you don't need them. Most clients find their actual cost per productive hour is 15-30% lower with temps when they factor in flexibility and zero overhead. Want me to show you the real math for your situation?
cost_objection.reframe: The question isn't cost per hour, it's cost per problem solved and flexibility gained

quality_objection.objection: Temp workers won't care about quality like permanent employees
quality_objection.real_concern: Fear of poor work affecting reputation and customer relationships
quality_objection.authentic_response: I understand that concern - you've probably had bad experiences. Here's what's different: Our workers know every assignment is an audition for their next one. We track performance ratings, and workers who don't meet standards don't get sent out again. Plus, many temps are looking for temp-to-hire opportunities, so they're motivated to impress. That said, temps need clear expectations and proper onboarding just like anyone else. We'll help you set them up for success, and if someone isn't working out, we replace them immediately - no awkward firing process.
quality_objection.reframe: Quality comes from proper screening, clear expectations, and accountability - which we handle

reliability_objection.objection: What if temp workers don't show up or quit mid-assignment?
reliability_objection.real_concern: Fear of being left in worse position than current understaffing
reliability_objection.authentic_response: Valid concern. Here's our reality: No-shows happen about [X]% of the time industry-wide. Here's how we handle it: First, our screening process flags reliability issues. Second, we confirm with workers the night before. Third - and this is key - if someone doesn't show, you call us and we have a replacement there within [X] hours. You're never left hanging. Compare that to a permanent hire who quits - you're back to square one with no backup. With us, you have a bench.
reliability_objection.reframe: The question is who handles the reliability risk - you alone, or you with agency backup

commitment_objection.objection: I don't want to be locked into a long-term contract
commitment_objection.real_concern: Fear of being stuck with poor service or changing needs
commitment_objection.authentic_response: We don't do long-term contracts because we don't need to - we keep clients by performing, not by trapping them. You can stop using our service any time. Most clients start with one position to test us out. If we deliver, they expand. If we don't, they walk away. No penalties, no games. Fair enough?
commitment_objection.reframe: Our flexibility is the whole point - why would we take that away with contracts?

control_objection.objection: I lose control over who works in my business
control_objection.real_concern: Fear of unsuitable workers damaging operations or culture
control_objection.authentic_response: Actually, you have more control, not less. You tell us exactly what you need - skills, experience, even personality fit. We pre-screen and send candidates that match. You interview them if you want, or we can send them directly. If someone doesn't work out on day one or day thirty, you tell us and we replace them - no HR headaches, no unemployment claims. With permanent hiring, you're stuck with bad fits for weeks or months. With us, you have control with an eject button.
control_objection.reframe: Control means ability to change course quickly, not just making the initial choice

industry_fit_objection.objection: Temp agencies don't understand our specific industry needs
industry_fit_objection.real_concern: Fear of workers lacking critical skills or knowledge
industry_fit_objection.authentic_response: You're right to ask - generic agencies waste your time with unqualified workers. We specialize in [INDUSTRY/ROLE TYPE] and maintain a pool of workers with [SPECIFIC SKILLS/CERTIFICATIONS]. We've staffed for [SIMILAR COMPANIES] facing [SIMILAR CHALLENGES]. That said, you know your operation better than anyone - we'll ask detailed questions about your specific needs and environment to ensure proper matches. And remember, if we send someone who doesn't fit, we replace them immediately and learn for next time.
industry_fit_objection.reframe: Industry fit comes from asking the right questions and learning from each placement

temp_to_perm_objection.objection: What if I want to hire a temp worker permanently?
